doc.str: POWER-OPERATED HANDHELD INSTRUMENT, IN PARTICULAR HANDHELD SURGICAL INSTRUMENT

The invention relates to a power-operated handheld instrument (1), in particular a power-operated handheld surgical instrument, comprising an electric motor (2), a clamping means (3), which is driven by the electric motor (2), for attachment of a tool (4), for example a drill, a cutter or a saw blade (54), an electronic control module (5), a first actuating means (6) and a second actuating means (7) for controlling the electric motor (2), an energy storage means (8), for example a rechargeable battery (15), and a housing (9). In this case, the electric motor (2) is in the form of a three-phase motor (50), wherein the electronic control module (5) for the electric motor (2, 50) can generate from the energy storage means (8) a three-phase current with a frequency which is designed for achieving a desired rotation speed.
GEISTER MEDIZINTECHNIK GMBH | KUM CONSULTING & TRADING GMBH | REIZNER, JULIUS
